Installation
===========

Requirements
-----------

* Python 3.10+
* Gradio
* pandas
* numpy
* pytest

Installing from PyPI
------------------

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install chunking-pandas

Installing from source
--------------------

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/JohnnyTeutonic/ChunkingForPandas.git
   cd chunking-experiment
   pip install -e .
